text: Andrea Lynn Evans (June 18, 1957 - July 9, 2023) was an American actress. She worked mostly on television soap operas. She played Rebecca Hotchkiss in the soap opera Passions, and Tawny in the series The Bold and the Beautiful. Evans was born in Aurora, Illinois. Evans died of breast cancer at her home in Pasadena, California, on July 9, 2023, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:1957 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:People from Aurora, Illinois
title: Andrea Evans
